subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
Polls and Public Opinion
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Bill Tilden was the dominant men’s player of the 1920s, and still holds the record for consecutive U.S. Open wins by a man, but his off-the-court vices caused him to be shunned by tennis.
snippet: Bill Tilden was the dominant men’s player of the 1920s, and still holds the record for consecutive U.S. Open wins by a man, but his off-the-court vices caused him to be shunned by tennis.
